title: GET_TRAIN_CURRENT_TRACK_NODE
content:
0xE015E854// GetTrainCurrentTrackNode
int GET_TRAIN_CURRENT_TRACK_NODE(Vehicle train);Parameters:train: The target train.Returns: Train's current track node index.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_TRAIN_CURRENT_TRACK_NODE
GetTrainCurrentTrackNode(vehicle)
